name: forecast
title: forecast-raycast
description: A Raycast extension to handle all things Forecast.
author: Vanluren

commands.name: start-time-tracker
commands.title: Start Time Tracker
commands.description: Start a time tracker for a task in Forecast

commands.name: stop-time-tracker
commands.title: Stop Time Tracker
commands.description: Stop the currently running time tracker in Forecast

commands.name: view-task
commands.title: View Task
commands.description: View a specific task in Forecast

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
